Class DrinkIngredientsManager

java.lang.Object
DrinkIngredientsManager
public class DrinkIngredientsManager extends Object
Manages the ingredients for drinks in a bubble tea shop application. This class handles database connections, ingredient initialization, inventory checks, and updates for drink orders.
Since:
2025-03-05

  • Constructor Details

    • DrinkIngredientsManager

      public DrinkIngredientsManager()
      Default constructor. Initializes the DrinkIngredientsManager, establishes a database connection and loads drink ingredients.

    • DrinkIngredientsManager

      public DrinkIngredientsManager(Connection conn)
      Constructor that uses an existing database connection.
      Parameters:
      conn - the database connection to use

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static DrinkIngredientsManager getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of DrinkIngredientsManager. Creates a new instance if one doesn't exist yet.
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of DrinkIngredientsManager

    • addDrinkIngredientToDB

      public void addDrinkIngredientToDB(int drinkId, int ingredientId, int quantity)
      Adds a new drink-ingredient relationship to the database.
      Parameters:
      drinkId - the ID of the drink
      ingredientId - the ID of the ingredient
      quantity - the quantity of the ingredient

    • updateInventoryForDrink

      public boolean updateInventoryForDrink(int drinkId)
      Updates inventory levels when a drink is ordered. Decrements the quantity of each ingredient used in the drink. Uses a transaction to ensure all updates succeed or none do.
      Parameters:
      drinkId - the ID of the drink being ordered
      Returns:
      true if inventory was successfully updated, false otherwise

    • checkInventoryForDrink

      public boolean checkInventoryForDrink(int drinkId)
      Checks if there's enough inventory for a drink.
      Parameters:
      drinkId - the ID of the drink to check
      Returns:
      true if there's enough inventory for the drink, false otherwise

    • getIngredientNamesForDrink

      public List<String> getIngredientNamesForDrink(int drinkId)
      Gets the ingredient names for a specific drink.
      Parameters:
      drinkId - the ID of the drink
      Returns:
      a list of ingredient names

    • reloadIngredients

      public void reloadIngredients()
      Reloads ingredients from the database. Clears the current ingredient map and re-initializes it.
